section.p: Measurement of end tidal carbon dioxide

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11558 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.168"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11307)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10294)/@code="19889-5" Carbon dioxide/Gas.total.at end expiration in Exhaled gas (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10293)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11308)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:10295)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.16 UCUM units will typically be "%", "mmHg", or "kPa".
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11307)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10294)/@code="19889-5" Carbon dioxide/Gas.total.at end expiration in Exhaled gas (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10293)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11308)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:10295)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.16 UCUM units will typically be "%", "mmHg", or "kPa".

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.168"/> <code code="19889-5" displayName="Carbon dioxide/Gas.total.at end expiration in Exhaled gas"/> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation>
